nodes.text: Blue Squadron was a squadron of X-wing starfighters serving the New Republic.

In 8 ABY, Force-sensitive Garosian rebel Alexandra Winger experienced a recurring dream of flying an X-wing starfighter with Blue Squadron as Blue Four, under the command of a pilot identified as Blue Leader.

By 12 ABY, Winger had joined the starfighter squadron under the call sign Blue Three with Blue Four Chaz Hunter as her wingmate. Blue Squadron participated in a patrol for Imperial starships following information from New Republic Intelligence, during which Winger was ambushed and captured by Captain Brandei's Star Destroyer Judicator. Blue Squadron's X-wings would later provide air support for Dair Haslip's rescue of Winger from Imperial custody on Janara III.
